product_name: WTB Vigilante 27.5 Light TCS Tire - 27.5 x 2.3
long_description: The Vigilante 27.5 light TCS tire is the premier all-mountain tire from MTB. It's built to be lightweight while delivering excellent traction so you can go full speed down the course.
short_description: The Vigilante 27.5 light TCS tire is the premier all-mountain tire from MTB. It's built to be lightweight while delivering excellent traction so you can go full speed down the course.
